channel.title: XgBoost, GLM on Volak Sin

item.title: Workers' Compensation Claim Severity Analysis
item.description: Created an analysis methodology to help predict future workers’ compensation claim severities Engineered features from text to to improve model performance and work hours to work shifts. Applied LASSO linear regression, Random Forest, and optimized XGBoost hyperparameters using cross validation SUMMARY & INSIGHTS The project task involved analyzing workers’ compensation claim level loss experience. As with most insurance experience, the distribution of claim severities was highly skewed with a max claim amount of $3.
